TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Compensator extends System.EnterpriseServices.ServicedComponent

summary.span: 모든 CRM(Compensating Resource Manager) Compensator에 대한 기본 클래스를 나타냅니다.

span.span: Represents the base class for all Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 사용자는 사용자 지정 트랜잭션 보상을 작성 하기 위해이 개체에서 확장 해야 합니다.The user should extend from this object in order to write a custom transaction Compensator. Compensator에 게는 항상 public 생성자를; 있어야 그렇지 않으면 해당 복구 엔진 만들 수 없습니다.A Compensator must always have a public constructor; otherwise, the recovery engine cannot create it. 자세한 내용은 [방법:는 Manager CRM (Compensating Resource)을 만들](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029).For more information, see [How to: Create a Compensating Resource Manager (CRM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0a8a024b-0be1-4519-a659-076577278029). ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는이 클래스를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code example demonstrates the use of this class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#20)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#20)] 이 compensator에이 게 다음 작업자 클래스에 의해 사용 됩니다.This compensator is used by the following worker class. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmserver.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmserver.cs#10)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmserver.vb#10)] 다음 코드 예제에서는이 보상 및 작업자를 실행 하는 클라이언트를 보여 줍니다.The following code example demonstrates a client that exercises this compensator and worker. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/cpp/crmclient.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/CS/crmclient.cs#30)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Crm#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Crm/VB/crmclient.vb#30)]
